mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mybklist(memId, mybkListWrite, mybkListFinished) VALUES(#{memId}, #{mybkListWrite}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mybklist WHERE memId = #{memId} ORDER BY mybkListNo ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE mybklist SET mybkListFinished = CASE mybkListFinished WHEN 0 THEN 1 WHEN 1 THEN 0 END WHERE mybkListNo = #{mybkListNo} AND memId = #{memId}
